item.title:
Jonah Hauer-King has written a script about prisoners of war during WWII who start theater companies and stage plays to explore “their ways of finding some purpose and meaning in their lives.”
The film is currently in pre-production.
(https://thecut.com/2023/05/jonah-hauer-king-prince-eric-little-mermaid-interview.html…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: ‘THE LITTLE MERMAID’ debuts with a Rotten Tomatoes score of 68% from 19 reviews so far.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: “Dance The Night” by Dua Lipa from #Barbie — out this Friday.

item.title:
“‘THE LITTLE MERMAID’ is a delightful, lovingly crafted and surprisingly soulful movie anchored by a powerful, endlessly charismatic performance from Halle Bailey.”
Our review of #TheLittleMermaid: https://filmupdates.net/2023/05/22/review-the-little-mermaid/…

item.title: A new song by Dua Lipa from the ‘BARBIE’ soundtrack will be released this Friday.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Jude Law read accounts of people being able to smell King Henry VIII's stench from three rooms away, so he wanted to "smell awful" on set of Karim Aïnouz’s ‘FIREBRAND.’
He had a perfumier make a scent out of “puss, blood, fecal matter and sweat.”
item.author: FilmUpdates
